QuestData.Title: A Shade of Dread
QuestData.Description: The last ingredient is perhaps the deadliest.$B$BThe dreadshade flower grows all along these hills.$B$BIt is by eating these poisonous plants that the local wildlife has become so venomous.$B$BA single drop of dreadshade nectar can stop a kunchong's heart.$B$BGo and bring me some of these flowers. Do not be tempted to taste them.
